success.title: Account Created
success.message: Please check your email for the confirmation link

success.title: Signed Out
success.message: You have been successfully signed out

removeAccount.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.

success.title: Account Deleted
success.message: Your account has been successfully deleted

success.title: Reset Email Sent
success.message: Check your email for password reset instructions

error.title: Reset Failed

success.title: Password Changed
success.message: Your password has been successfully changed

about.title: About PlaygroundMap
about.description: PlaygroundMap is meant to help families find good local playgrounds. On PlaygroundMap you can find new playgrounds, rate them and track your visits, without fees, ads or tracking.

mapLayers.title: Map Layers
content: Aerial imagery © Esri, i-cubed, USDA, USGS, AEX, GeoEye, Getmapping, Aerogrid, IGN, IGP, UPR-EGP, and the GIS User Community

playgroundInfo.title: Playground Information
content: Helsinki region: Service Map APIs of the Helsinki Metropolitan Area. The data is maintained by the Helsingin kapunginkanslia / Digitalization Unit and originally created by the cities of Helsinki, Espoo, Vantaa, and Kauniainen. The data has been downloaded from the Helsinki Region Infoshare service on 24.02.2025 under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 license.
Tampere: Tampere playgrounds. Data has been downloaded from the Tampere City Data Portal on 26.02.2025 under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 license.
Turku and Kaarina: Turku and Kaarina playgrounds. Data has been downloaded from the Avoindata.fi service on 26.02.2025 under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 license.
Oulu: Oulu playgrounds. Data has been downloaded from the Oulu City Data Portal on 02.03.2025 under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 license.
Other cities: Playground data has been downloaded from OpenStreetMap on 02.03.2025 under the Open Database License. https://www.openstreetmap.org/copyright

map.noVisiblePlaygrounds: No playgrounds visible in current view
map.noPlaygroundsMatchFilters: No playgrounds match your current filters

playground.name: Name

login.required: Login required to mark as visited

rating.title: Rating
rating.requiredForPublic: You need to rate the playground before making it public
rating.publicExplanation:
Public ratings will be included in the average score and rating count.

Only aggregated data is ever shown to other users.

playground.defaultPublicEnabled: Your new ratings will be public by default
playground.defaultPublicDisabled: Your new ratings will be private by default
playground.loginToInteract: Please log in to mark playgrounds as visited or rate them

edit.title: Edit Playground
edit.description: Propose changes to this playground. Your suggestions will be reviewed by administrators.
edit.reasonPlaceholder: Please explain why you're suggesting these changes (optional)

noChanges.title: No Changes
noChanges.description: You haven't made any changes to submit

editModeEnabled.title: Edit Mode Enabled
editModeEnabled.description: You can now propose changes to playgrounds

editModeDisabled.title: Edit Mode Disabled
editModeDisabled.description: Edit mode has been turned off

success.title: Changes Proposed
success.editProposed: Your changes have been proposed and will be reviewed
success.deletionProposed: Your deletion request has been proposed and will be reviewed

deleteConfirm.title: Confirm Deletion Request
deleteConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to propose this playground for deletion? This action will be reviewed by administrators.
deleteConfirm.reasonPlaceholder: Please explain why you think this playground should be deleted (optional)

add.title: Add New Playground
add.selectLocation: Select a location for the new playground
add.reasonPlaceholder: Please explain why you're adding this playground (optional)

error.title: Error
error.noLocation: Please select a location for the playground
error.emptyName: Please enter a name for the playground

success.title: Proposal Submitted
success.message: Your proposal to add a new playground has been submitted and will be reviewed

proposals.title: Edit Proposals
proposals.notesPlaceholder: Enter notes about your decision (required for rejection)
proposals.requireNotes: Please provide notes explaining the rejection

success.approveDescription: The proposal has been approved and changes have been applied
success.revertDescription: The changes have been successfully reverted

proposals.deletionExplanation: This proposal requests the complete removal of this playground. Please review carefully before approving.
